sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.resource_management" name="Resource Management" version="1.0.0" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" licensable="true" license_model="producer"> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.glide.schedules.schedule_page" class="com.glide.schedules.SchedulePageTag"/> <extension point="com.glide.element" name="repeat_count" class="com.glide.script.glide_elements.GlideElementNumeric"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ResourceManagementUtility" class="com.snc.resource_management.ResourceManagementUtility"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ResourceManagementAPI" class="com.snc.resource_management.ResourceManagementAPI"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RMChartImageConverter" class="com.snc.resource_management.RMChartImageConverter"/> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.schedule_loader"/> <import plugin="com.snc.process_flow_formatter" /> <import plugin="com.snc.cost_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.pps_portal_common"/> </requires> <description>The Resource Management application enables resource requesters and resource managers to plan, organize, and manage resources for both planned and operational work. Activating Resource Management automatically activates the Project Management application if it is not already installed. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <no_activate>true</no_activate> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>The Resource Management application enables resource requesters and resource managers to plan, organize, and manage resources for both planned and operational work. Activating Resource Management automatically activates the Project Management application if it is not already installed. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.resource_management</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Resource Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.resource_management/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.schedule_loader,com.snc.process_flow_formatter,com.snc.cost_management,com.snc.pps_portal_common</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.resource_management</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
